net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [h: Target = if(argCount() == 3, arg(argCount() - 1), currentToken())] [h: Name = arg(0)] [h: Default = arg(1)] [h, token(Target): value = if(isPropertyEmpty(Name), Default, getProperty(Name))] [h: macro.return = if(length(string(value)) == 0, Default, value)]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: getPropertyWithDefault

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [h, foreach(macro, getMacros()): defineFunction(macro, macro + "@Lib:Util")]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: onCampaignLoad

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [h: setProperty(arg(0), arg(1))] [h, IF(arg(1) == arg(2)) : resetProperty(arg(0))]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: setPropertyWithDefault

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[h: TempHP = getPropertyWithDefault("Temporary HP", 0)] [h: MaxHP = getProperty("Maximum HP")] [h: HP = getPropertyWithDefault("Current HP", MaxHP)] [h: BloodiedHP = MaxHP / 2] [h: DyingHP = 0] [h: DeadHP = if(isPC(), -MaxHP / 2, 0)]
[h: macro.return = json.set( "", "TempHP", TempHP, "MaxHP", MaxHP, "HP", HP, "BloodiedHP", BloodiedHP, "DyingHP", DyingHP, "DeadHP", DeadHP )]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: getHealthStats

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[stats = arg(0)]
[h: MaxHP = json.get(stats, "MaxHP")] [h: HP = json.get(stats, "HP")] [h: TempHP = json.get(stats, "TempHP")] [h: DeadHP = json.get(stats, "DeadHP")] [h: DyingHP = json.get(stats, "DyingHP")] [h: BloodiedHP = json.get(stats, "BloodiedHP")]
[h: setProperty("Current HP", HP)] [h: setPropertyWithDefault("Temporary HP", TempHP, 0)]
[h: state.Dead = if(HP <= DeadHP, 1, 0)] [h: state.Dying = if(!state.Dead && HP <= DyingHP, 1, 0)] [h: state.Bloodied = if(!state.Dead && !state.Dying && HP <= BloodiedHP, 1, 0)]
[h: setBar("Health", HP/MaxHP)]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: setHealthStats

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[h: Health = arg(0)]
[h: stats = getHealthStats()] [h: HP = json.get(stats, "HP")] [h: MaxHP = json.get(stats, "MaxHP")]
<!-- Calculate healing --> [h: NewHP = min(MaxHP, max(0, HP) + Health)]
[h: stats = json.set(stats, "HP", NewHP)] [h: setHealthStats(stats)]
[h: macro.return = NewHP - HP]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: heal

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[h: Damage = arg(0)]
[h: Stats = getHealthStats()] [h: HP = json.get(Stats, "HP")] [h: MaxHP = json.get(Stats, "MaxHP")] [h: TempHP = json.get(Stats, "TempHP")]
<!-- Calculate damage --> [h: HPDamage = max(Damage - TempHP, 0)] [h: TempHP = max(TempHP - Damage, 0)] [h: HP = HP - HPDamage]
[h: Stats = json.set(Stats, "HP", HP)] [h: Stats = json.set(Stats, "TempHP", TempHP)] [h: setHealthStats(stats)]
[h: macro.return = Damage]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: damage

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[h: attackResult = arg(0)] [h: targetName = arg(1)] [h: targetDefense = arg(2)]
[h: defenseValue = getProperty(targetDefense,targetName)] [h: modDefense = getPropertyWithDefault("Mod " + targetDefense, 0, targetName)] [h: HalfLevel = halfLevel(targetName)]
[r,if(attackResult >= defenseValue + modDefense + HalfLevel): 1; 0]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: hitCheck

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [h: AbilityName = arg(0)] [h: Target = if(argCount() > 1, arg(argCount() - 1), currentToken())] [h: AbilityValue = getProperty(AbilityName, Target)] [h: macro.return = floor((AbilityValue - 10) / 2)]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: getAbilityMod
askForTarget
pronouns

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [h: Type = getArg(macro.args, 0, "Any")] [h: Weapons = "[]"] [h: i = 1] [h, while(!isPropertyEmpty("Weapon " + i + " Name")), CODE: { [h: Weapon = getWeapon(i)] [h: WeaponType = json.get(Weapon, "Type")] [h, if(WeaponType == Type || Type == "Any"): Weapons = json.append(Weapons, Weapon)] [h: i = i + 1] }] [h: macro.return = Weapons]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: getWeapons
getArg

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [h: Index = arg(0)] [h: Prefix = "Weapon " + Index + " "] [h: macro.return = json.set("{}", "Index", Index, "Name", getProperty(Prefix + "Name"), "Type", getPropertyWithDefault(Prefix + "Type", "None"), "Damage", getProperty(Prefix + "Damage"), "Bonus", getPropertyWithDefault(Prefix + " Bonus", 0) )]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: getWeapon

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [h: Array = arg(0)] [h: Key = arg(1)] [h: Result = "[]"] [h, foreach(Object, Array), CODE: { [Result = json.append(Result, json.get(Object, Key))] }] [h: macro.return = Result]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: json.getAll

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [h: Filter = getArg(macro.args, 0, "all")] [h: TokenList = getVisibleTokenNames("json")] [h: FilterList = "[]"] [h, if (Filter == 'npc'): FilterList = getNPCNames("json")] [h, if (Filter == 'pc'): FilterList = getPCNames("json")] [h, if (Filter == 'all'): FilterList = TokenList] [h: Results = json.intersection(TokenList, FilterList)] [h: Libraries = json.fromList("Lib:Util,Lib:UI")] [h: macro.return = json.toList(json.difference(Results, Libraries))]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: targetList

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [h: macro.return = "AC, Fortitude, Reflexes, Will"]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: defenseList

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [h: macro.return = "Strength, Constitution, Dexterity, Intelligence, Wisdom, Charisma"]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: abilityList

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [h: Target = currentToken()] [h: macro.return = floor(getProperty("Level", Target) / 2)]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: halfLevel

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [h: macro.return ="Acrobatics, Arcana, Athletics, Bluff, Diplomacy, Dungeoneering, Endurance, Heal, History, Insight, Intimidate, Nature, Perception, Religion, Stealth, Streetwise, Thievery"]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: skillList

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [h: Target = arg(0)] [h: StateName = arg(1)] [h: Current = getState(StateName, Target)] [h: NewVal = getArg(macro.args, 2, Current)] [h: setState(StateName, NewVal, Target)] [h: macro.return = NewVal]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: state

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[h: Ability = arg(0)] [h: OppSkill = arg(1)] [h: Bonus = getArg(macro.args, 2, 0)] [h: Target = getArg(macro.args, 3, "")] [h, if(Target == ""): Target = askForTarget("npc")]
[h: AttackMod = getPropertyWithDefault("Mod Attack", 0)] [h: AbilityMod = getAbilityMod(Ability)] [h: HalfLevel = halfLevel()]
[h: Roll = 1d20] [h: Attack = Roll + AbilityMod + HalfLevel + Bonus + AttackMod] [h: AttackRoll = "1d20 (" + Roll + ") + Modifier (" + (Attack - Roll) + ") = " + Attack + " vs. " + OppSkill] [h: IsHit = hitCheck(Attack, Target, OppSkill)] [h: IsCritical = if(Roll == 20 && IsHit, 1, 0)] [h: Description = if (IsCritical, "scores a critical hit on", if (IsHit, "hits", "misses"))] [h: Pronoun = listGet(pronouns(), 1)]
[h: macro.return = json.set("", "Description", Description, "Roll", AttackRoll, "RawRoll", Roll, "Target", Target)]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: singleAttack

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[h: Ability = arg(0)] [h: OppSkill = arg(1)] [h: Result = "[]"] [h, foreach (Target, askForTarget("all", 1)), CODE: {
[h: Bonus = 0] [h: AttackMod = getPropertyWithDefault("Mod Attack", 0)] [h: AbilityMod = getAbilityMod(Ability)] [h: HalfLevel = halfLevel()]
[h: Roll = 1d20] [h: Attack = Roll + AbilityMod + HalfLevel + Bonus + AttackMod] [h: AttackRoll = "1d20 (" + Roll + ") + Modifier (" + (Attack - Roll) + ") = " + Attack + " vs. " + OppSkill] [h: IsHit = hitCheck(Attack, Target, OppSkill)] [h: IsCritical = if(Roll == 20 && IsHit, 1, 0)] [h: Description = if (IsCritical, "scores a critical hit on", if (IsHit, "hits", "misses"))] [h: Pronoun = listGet(pronouns(), 1)]
[h: Result = json.append(Result, json.set("", "Description", Description, "Roll", AttackRoll, "RawRoll", Roll, "Target", Target))] }]
[h: macro.return = Result]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: multiAttack
